instructions.title: How To Delete Your Adidas Account From Its Website
instructions.before: Currently there are two methods to delete your account from Adidas.  You can delete your account by Website or Delete your account by Sending Mail to adidas and requesting account deletion.
instructions.after: Once this process is complete, you will be directed to the account registration page and receive an email confirming that your account has been deleted.

qnAnswers.question: What actually gets deleted when I delete my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Deleting your account will remove all your account data including your personal details from the database. Plus, you will no longer receive any email communication from adidas.

qnAnswers.question: If I just want to stop receiving email notification do I have to delete my entire Adidas Account?
qnAnswers.answer: No. To stop the emails and the push notification on your mobile device just adjust your account settings.  You do not need to delete your entire account.

qnAnswers.question: What do I do if I sign onto Adidas using a third party account?
qnAnswers.answer: If you logged into Adidas using Facebook, Yahoo, or Google, you need to disconnect the account from those platforms and then follow the Deletion protocol through adidas.
